com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SOURCE_TO_IMAGE_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the source-to-image repository to test against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SOURCE_TO_IMAGE_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the source-to-image repository to test against.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

hudson.plugins.descriptionsetter.Descrip.description:
Using the source-to-image ${SOURCE_TO_IMAGE_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.
Using the source-to-image ${SOURCE_TO_IMAGE_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image" make build sudo cp /data/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image/_output/local/bin/linux/amd64/s2i /usr/bin SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 300 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: TEST S2I ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: TEST S2I [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image" hack/verify-gofmt.sh hack/build-test-images.sh hack/test-go.sh hack/test-integration.sh hack/test-stirunimage.sh SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 7200 ${script}\""
